æŠŠé©¼å³°å‘½åè½¬æ¢ä¸ºä¸‹åˆ’çº¿â€‹ underscored: true,â€‹ scopes: {â€‹ bh: {â€‹ attributes: {â€‹ exclude: ['password', 'updated_at', 'deleted_at', 'created_at']â€‹ }â€‹ },â€‹ iv: {â€‹ attributes: {â€‹ exclude: ['content', 'password', 'updated_at', 'deleted_at']â€‹ }â€‹ }â€‹ }â€‹ }})// åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å‹sequelize.sync({â€‹ force: false})module.exports = {â€‹ sequelize} model "Jane"User.destroy({ where: { firstName: "Jane" }}).then(() => { console.log("Done");});// Change everyone without a last name to "Doe"User.update({ lastName: "Doe" }, { where: { lastName: null }}).then(() => { console.log("Done");}); ç”±æ­¤æ¥çœ‹ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰typeormè£…é¥°ç±»çš„æ–¹å¼çœ‹ç€é¡ºçœ¼ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ•´ä½“æ„é€
